message.body: :P I figured. You got high praise
My fucking saddle and seat post got stolen while we were there
Yeah. I had brooks on both bikes. It's dark brown and it had the Sefas cover on it if you see someone carrying it down the street
Jesus that sucks. They make special seatbolts with a keyed Allen but that's just absurd. I might have one laying around, not sure if I sold it but I can check
I need to get directions to French creek from you today or tonight
Cool. I should be around this evening and we can look at routes.
